name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with rich, flavorful meat sauce.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a pan, sauté onions and garlic until softened.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Pour in tomato sauce and let simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve the sauce over the cooked spaghetti.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: A healthy and delicious Caesar salad topped with grilled chicken.
instructions: Grill the chicken breast until fully cooked.
Chop romaine lettuce and place in a large bowl.
Toss the lettuce with Caesar dressing.
Top with grilled chicken, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.

name: Vegetarian Stir-Fry
description: A quick and easy vegetable stir-fry with a savory soy sauce.
instructions: Heat oil in a wok and add chopped vegetables.
Stir-fry for 5-7 minutes until vegetables are tender.
Add soy sauce and stir well.
Serve hot with steamed rice.

name: Beef Tacos
description: Classic Mexican tacos filled with seasoned beef and fresh toppings.
instructions: Brown the beef in a skillet and add taco seasoning.
Warm the taco shells in the oven.
Fill the shells with beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.
Serve immediately.

name: Margarita Pizza
description: Simple yet delicious pizza topped with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil.
instructions: Preheat the oven to 220°C (425°F).
Roll out the pizza dough and spread tomato sauce over it.
Top with fresh mozzarella slices and tomato.
Bake for 12-15 minutes until the crust is golden.
Garnish with fresh basil leaves before serving.

name: Chicken Alfredo
description: Creamy pasta dish made with Alfredo sauce and grilled chicken.
instructions: Cook the fettuccine according to package instructions.
In a pan, melt butter and add garlic, cream, and Parmesan cheese.
Add cooked fettuccine and grilled chicken.
Toss everything together until well-coated.
Serve with extra Parmesan on top.

name: Avocado Toast
description: Simple and healthy toast topped with mashed avocado and a hint of lime.
instructions: Toast the bread until golden and crisp.
Mash the avocado in a bowl and season with lime juice and salt.
Spread the mashed avocado over the toast.
Garnish with chili flakes or extra toppings if desired.

name: Egg Fried Rice
description: Quick and easy fried rice with scrambled eggs, vegetables, and soy sauce.
instructions: Cook rice and let it cool completely.
In a wok, scramble the eggs and set aside.
Stir-fry the vegetables in the wok with oil.
Add the rice and stir well with soy sauce.
Add the scrambled eggs back to the wok and mix.

name: Shrimp Scampi
description: Delicious shrimp cooked in a garlic butter sauce served over pasta.
instructions: Cook the pasta according to package instructions.
In a pan, melt butter and sauté garlic until fragrant.
Add the shrimp and cook until pink.
Stir in lemon juice and parsley.
Serve the shrimp over the cooked pasta.

name: Greek Salad
description: A fresh and healthy salad with cucumber, tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese.
instructions: Chop the cucumber, tomatoes, and red onion.
Combine them in a bowl with olives and feta cheese.
Drizzle with olive oil and season with oregano and salt.
Toss everything together and serve.

name: Pancakes
description: Fluffy and delicious pancakes, perfect for breakfast or brunch.
instructions: Whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
In another bowl, whisk milk, egg, and melted butter.
Combine the wet and dry ingredients until just mixed.
Heat a griddle and pour batter onto it, cooking until bubbles form.
Flip and cook until golden on both sides.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: Tender and flaky grilled salmon seasoned with lemon and herbs.
instructions: Season the salmon with olive oil, lemon juice, and herbs.
Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
Grill the salmon for 6-8 minutes per side until cooked through.
Serve with steamed vegetables or rice.

name: Chicken Fajitas
description: Sizzling chicken fajitas with bell peppers and onions, served with tortillas.
instructions: Slice the chicken, bell peppers, and onions.
Heat a skillet and sauté the vegetables and chicken until cooked.
Season with fajita seasoning and cook for 5 more minutes.
Serve with warm tortillas and your choice of toppings.

name: Beef Stew
description: Hearty beef stew with tender meat, potatoes, and carrots simmered in a rich broth.
instructions: Brown the beef in a large pot and set aside.
In the same pot, sauté onions and garlic.
Add the beef back to the pot along with broth, potatoes, and carrots.
Simmer for 1-2 hours until the beef is tender.
Season with salt and pepper and serve.

name: Quinoa Salad
description: Healthy and refreshing quinoa salad with cucumber, tomatoes, and feta cheese.
instructions: Cook the quinoa according to package instructions and let it cool.
Chop the cucumber and tomatoes.
Mix the quinoa with vegetables and crumbled feta cheese.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Toss everything together and serve.
